=== Blueprints and Status ===
* Work Item Status for Precise: http://status.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-precise/canonical-platform-qa.html 
* Work Item Status for Alpha 2:  http://status.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-precise/canonical-platform-qa-precise-alpha-2.html

=== What was done engineering wise? ===
* Automated install/upgrade testing
** Initial autotest package created.

* Investigate kernel tests for SRUs
** Inventoried <nowiki>[[https://wiki.canonical.com/SteveConklin/LtpTestList|ltp tests available ]]</nowiki>
** Framework is in development to provide details results reporting from ltp through jenkins

* Boot Speed testing
** Daily boot speed testing run on Desktop i386
** Report: <nowiki>[[http://reports.qa.ubuntu.com/reports/boot-speed/]]</nowiki>
** More systems and benchmark tests to be added

* Other
** The test cases from the wiki are being re-written by the community.
** New smoke tests are being generated by the community and will be added to Jenkins when ready. 
** Litmus is being substituted by the Mozilla team in favor of a newly created tool, Case Conductor that will be in Beta phase in January, we are going to collaborate with them in getting that tool fit for purpose for our testing needs.
** Bug reports modified to use new tagging at: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QATeam/AutomatedTesting/TestingTypeAndBugTracking
